summary.span: 将此 实例中的字节复制到传入缓冲区中并返回复制的字节数。

span.span: Copies bytes from this instance to the passed-in buffer and returns the number of copied bytes.

returns.span: 一个 长值，表示已复制的字节数。

span.span: An long value representing the number of copied bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尝试读取超出，将引发异常。If an attempt is made to read beyond , an exception is thrown. 如果`count`指定不是可从要复制的更多字节`offset`仅可用字节数复制到值的末尾。If `count` specifies more bytes to be copied than are available from the `offset` to the end of the value, only the available bytes are copied. 如果目标缓冲区为空引用，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer is a null reference. 如果目标缓冲区无法接收请求的所有字符，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer cannot receive as many characters as requested.

summary.span: 将传入缓冲区中的字节复制到此 实例中。

span.span: Copies bytes from the passed-in buffer to this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此操作会将写入到的位置超出之内，更新以反映新的结束位置。If this operation writes to a position beyond but within , is updated to reflect the new ending position. 值`offsetInBuffer`必须小于或等于。The value of `offsetInBuffer` must be less than or equal to . 否则将引发异常。An exception is thrown otherwise. 写入到的 null 值实例时，可以指定的值为 0。Only a value of 0 can be specified when writing to a null value instance. 如果尝试写入超过，将引发异常。If an attempt is made to write beyond , an exception is thrown.
